title.en: Karisome Tsuma wa Enman na Rien wo Shomou Shimasu! - Kouri no Kishi no Dekiai wa Wakarizurai

altTitles.ja: かりそめ妻は円満な離縁を所望します!～氷の騎士の溺愛はわかりづらい～

altTitles.ja-ro: Karisome Tsuma wa Enman na Rien wo Shomou Shimasu! - Kouri no Kishi no Dekiai wa Wakarizurai

description.en: "I will never wish to be loved by you," Freya told her husband Logan on their wedding night in their bedroom. She was afraid of finding out that he still loves her sister and does not want even a token marriage... Freya, daughter of the Countess of Reyvaan, has had a crush on Logan Adelbright, also a count, ever since he rescued her when she was young. When Logan grew up to be a sturdy knight and became engaged to her sister Sophia, she tried to give up her unfulfilled love without telling anyone, but the engagement was broken off when Sophia was suddenly nominated as a candidate for the Dauphin's wife, according to the Dauphin's wishes. Freya is to take her place, but Logan's heart still lies with her sister... Freya is hurt whenever Logan, who is a knight of the Kingsguard and famous as the "Lion of Ice," treats her coldly. She is also upset when Logan, who is busy working as a member of the Dauphin's entourage, neglects her as newlyweds, and then suddenly asks her to do things that are more like a married couple. Freya is trying to find a happy ending to their marriage for the sake of their mutual happiness, but Logan is...?
